messages.title: Brecon & Radnorshire – My Home
messages.content: As the Conservative Government forces us to a hard Brexit, I want to make sure that the damage is limited... we have the support of our Assembly Member Kirsty Williams and of former MP Roger Williams.

messages.title: Your Vote Counts!
messages.content: In Brecon & Radnorshire it's a two-horse race between James and the Conservatives. The other parties are far behind.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Brecon & Radnorshire it's a two-horse race between James and the Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: As the Conservative Government forces us to a hard Brexit, I want to make sure that the damage is limited.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will be a local MP for everyone representing all towns and villages.
